Map039.Event[38].Page[0].list.message[0]: "Oh...? You seem to have gotten through my servant."
Map039.Event[38].Page[0].list.message[2]: "Oh... We haven't met before, have we?"
Map039.Event[38].Page[0].list.message[3]: "My name is Nosramus. I'm an alchemist living down here.
Map039.Event[38].Page[0].list.message[4]: You cannot quite tell if the alchemist is a woman or a man.
Something in their stature seems almost otherwordly or
Map039.Event[38].Page[0].list.message[5]: "Oh... We haven't met before, have we?"
Map039.Event[38].Page[0].list.message[6]: "My name is Nosramus. I'm an alchemist living down here.
Map039.Event[38].Page[0].list.message[7]: You cannot quite tell if the alchemist is a woman or a man.
Something in their stature seems almost otherwordly or
Map039.Event[38].Page[0].list.message[8]: "Oh you are the one creeping in the shadows earlier."
Map039.Event[38].Page[0].list.message[9]: "My name is Nosramus. I'm an alchemist living down here.
Map039.Event[38].Page[0].list.message[10: You cannot quite tell if the alchemist is a woman or a man.
Something in their stature seems almost otherwordly or
Map039.Event[38].Page[0].list.message[12: "Having to resort to brute force like that...
My studies here are hundreds of years of old you see, and I
cannot let just anyone pass down here."
Map039.Event[38].Page[0].list.message[14: "Right. I think I know who you mean..."
Map039.Event[38].Page[0].list.message[15: "I don't meddle with anything that happens in the upper
floors, but I think the person you are looking for is
located in the dungeons just a few floors down."
Map039.Event[38].Page[0].list.message[16: "I'd hurry if I was you. He seems to be an incredible
person, but his time is running short..."
Map039.Event[38].Page[0].list.message[17: "Oh, I've been here for so long..."
Map039.Event[38].Page[0].list.message[19: "My studies? I study all fields of knowledge, just like
Map039.Event[38].Page[0].list.message[20: "My studies have taught me much about blood magic, deities,
gods and other such obvious subjects."
Map039.Event[38].Page[0].list.message[21: "At the moment I'm the most interested in nature and
Map039.Event[38].Page[0].list.message[22: "People in this age don't notice that nature is being lost
and that they're heading for extinction."
Map039.Event[38].Page[0].list.message[23: "That is one reason I ventured down into this darkness.
The primal rules of nature are still very much alive here."
Map039.Event[38].Page[0].list.message[25: "This place is actually very crucial to my studies. In all
of my years, I have not found a place where you could still
feel the presence of the gods so vividly as here."
Map039.Event[38].Page[0].list.message[26: "As far as the inconveniece of having a laboratory
Map039.Event[38].Page[0].list.message[27: "Well, people are suckers for convinience. They think the
more convenient - the better, and they end up throwing away
Map039.Event[38].Page[0].list.message[29: "How do you stay sane in this darkness?"
Map039.Event[38].Page[0].list.message[31: "We'd be in trouble if these dungeons were as bright as
Map039.Event[38].Page[0].list.message[32: "Well, I did have a servant with me. Until a moment ago..."
Map039.Event[38].Page[0].list.message[33: "But you took care of him... He - you noticed it was a
Map039.Event[38].Page[0].list.message[34: "He was no one anymore. He was but a soul bound to
Map039.Event[38].Page[0].list.message[35: "I would appreciate some working peace, if you don't mind."

Map039.Event[298].Page[0].list.message[2: "Right, that man... He sure was an interesting person."
Map039.Event[298].Page[0].list.message[3: "His fame overground reached even these dark dungeons and I
followed the treatment he got here closely as well."
Map039.Event[298].Page[0].list.message[4: "Not that I'm a part of the whole torturing-imprisonment deal
going on here these days haha."
Map039.Event[298].Page[0].list.message[5: "I was just observing events from the shadows."
Map039.Event[298].Page[0].list.message[6: "Did you know that he planned his imprisonment?"
Map039.Event[298].Page[0].list.message[7: "Everything that led to him getting caught, taken down
to this darkness and even the torture he experienced here..."
Map039.Event[298].Page[0].list.message[8: "It was all part of his plan."
Map039.Event[298].Page[0].list.message[1: "It's a special place. There is no other place in the western
world where you could get as close to the gods as here."
"Like many before him, he wanted to use the power that dwells
"He already achieved the state of dominance overground. He
achieved the enlightenment with the cube he brought here with
"His dreams would soar endlessly with the new goddess
visiting him in his dreams every night."
"And finally, the darkness and the torture he experienced
here would rival that of the gods."
"He got all the keys to become something greater."
"Not that it would necessarily be the right path for him,
but it did make an interesting event to unfold..."
"You got the doors to the ancient city open it seems..."
Map039.Event[298].Page[0].list.message[2: "The ancient city is what remains of the city of the gods
"The presence of the gods is fading. Even the presence of
"It was always just a matter of time."
"What do you know about the new gods?"
"They attained their position in order to rebel
against the old gods and the old order."
"But they are barking up the wrong tree."
"How can the older gods be responsible, if they haven't
been around for millenia? If they ever even existed...?"
"The truth is - Gods come and go. Humanity itself is the
cause of the misery and the dreadful state of the world
over the past few hundred years."
Map039.Event[298].Page[0].list.message[3: "Hundreds of years here, in the darkness, with nothing else
to do but study and read has its benefits."
Nosramus seems suspicious. Feels like he isn't telling the
Map039.Event[298].Page[1].list.message[1: "You got the doors to the ancient city open it seems..."
Map039.Event[298].Page[1].list.message[3: "The ancient city is what remains of the city of the gods
Map039.Event[298].Page[1].list.message[4: "The presence of the gods is fading. Even the presence of
Map039.Event[298].Page[1].list.message[5: "It was always just a matter of time."
Map039.Event[298].Page[1].list.message[6: "What do you know about the new gods?"
Map039.Event[298].Page[1].list.message[7: "They attained their position in order to rebel
against the old gods and the old order."
Map039.Event[298].Page[1].list.message[8: "But they are barking up the wrong tree."
Map039.Event[298].Page[1].list.message[9: "How can the older gods be responsible, if they haven't
been around for millenia? If they ever even existed...?"
Map039.Event[298].Page[1].list.message[1: "The truth is - Gods come and go. Humanity itself is the
cause of the misery and the dreadful state of the world
over the past few hundred years."
"Hundreds of years here, in the darkness, with nothing else
to do but study and read has its benefits."
Nosramus seems suspicious. Feels like he isn't telling the
Map039.Event[298].Page[2].list.message[0: "I really rather wouldn't waste my time on you."
Map039.Event[298].Page[3].list.message[1: \c[7]Nosramus\c[0]
"I take it that you talked to Valteil."
Map039.Event[298].Page[3].list.message[3: "He's hanging on a rope and waiting to rot."
"He seems to be regretting his past actions..."
Map039.Event[298].Page[3].list.message[5: Nosramus seems to show empathy for the enlightened one
Map039.Event[298].Page[3].list.message[6: "Well it's an end of an era in that case. It was inevitable."
Map039.Event[298].Page[3].list.message[8: "That's a first! He takes a lot of pride in his knowledge
and I have yet to see him admit his mistakes."
Map039.Event[298].Page[3].list.message[1: \c[7]Nosramus\c[0]
"Ah, I don't want to be stuck in nostalgia. Sorry about
my absent mind!"
"He said you were on the path to enlightenment..."
"He did mention that you were on a correct path..."
\c[7]Nosramus\c[0]
"Too bad I wasn't there to hear that."
\c[7]Nosramus\c[0]
"Really out-of-character for him to say that."
\c[7]Nosramus\c[0]
"Too bad I wasn't there to hear that."
\c[7]Nosramus\c[0]
"Really out-of-character for him to say that."
\c[7]Nosramus\c[0]
"He believed ascension was the key. That he could somehow
achieve enlightenment with a snap of fingers."
\c[7]Nosramus\c[0]
"That was a ridiculous idea. I cannot understand how a scholar
like him could believe there was such an easy way."
\c[7]Nosramus\c[0]
"The thing is..."
\c[7]Nosramus\c[0]
"There is no end on the path to enlightenment."
Map039.Event[298].Page[3].list.message[2: "New information, new forms of science, new people, new worlds...
Our knowledge of the universe keeps on increasing."
"How could you settle down thinking you are the end of it
"If you are on a path of enlightenment... Seek all knowledge."
"Even the knowledge of the new gods. I wholeheartedly
recommend that you sit on that golden throne and meet your
"But if you truly are a scholar of sciences - only observe.
Do not surrender yourself to the lust of power."
"I know it is not an easy task. So that's why you can have
You get the \c[2]Spirit anchor\c[0] from Nosramus.
"It's clearly the end of an era. So I'm just giving a little
helping hand to the new generation..."

every little murderous critter from a kilometers radius..."

back when one of you has perished or fled the horrors."
